reason.tex:
%text Recall the standard result \[ \qquad \sin^{-1} x + \cos^{-1} x = \frac\pi{2} \] And therefore, % \begin{align}
\tan^{-1} &= \frac\pi{4} \\ \text{and } \sin^{-1} \third &+ \cos^{-1}\third = \frac\pi{2} \\ \therefore y &= \frac\pi{4} + \frac\pi{2} = \frac{3\pi}{4} \end{align} %text %
